page.title: 02Desford Village (Part1)
page.content:
Desford is a large village with an old centre with a church and some cottages dating from 13th century. There have been 3 large{housing}developments to the S.E. of the village, trebling the size of the village. Most of the population work out of the village, many in Leicster and others the nearby factories of Tubes and Caterpiller. The village has strong{mining} traditions and many miners still live here although they have to travel to N.Warwickshire and S.Derbyshire to work.
....continued >>>
